name: (Spanish) Homepage - Key Links - Main links on homepage to assert that the Spanish pages open correctly

testSteps.description: (Spanish) Homepage - Key Links - Main links on homepage to assert that the Spanish pages open correctly #1: {mainLinksItem=encontrar ayuda, category=daily}

userStory.narrative:
In order to assert that the basic functionality of https://www.disasterassistance.gov/es/ is working
As a tester
I want to run the daily regressions at least twice a day
